about_the_game:
We're thrilled to present our exclusive soundtrack and fan package, designed with love and gratitude for our fantastic community.

The Coreborn Supporter Pack I is a treasure trove of content that will enhance your gaming experience while directly contributing to developing new features and improving our game. We sincerely appreciate your ongoing support in helping us build a better experience and fostering a strong collaboration with you, our community.

Included in the Package:
  • 6 Ambient Soundtracks (all Soundtracks playing on the Ambros Map)
  • 10 Desktop and Mobile Wallpapers
  • The official Tabletop Adventure "Bandits of Pipers Whistle"
  • The official Coreborn Comic (Creation of the Ultracore)

Thank you for considering this extra level of support. We immensely appreciate your contribution as we work together to create something extraordinary.
